name: Highest Horse!
description:
Play the World’s First Competitive Horse-Stacking Sport! Highest Horse is a 2D Platform fighting game where you joust opponents and stack horses! 

Compete against 3 different AI opponents in the Royal High Horse Championship! Use the gold you earn to upgrade your horses, lance, and sprint! Then, stack the most amount of horses by the time limit to win, and claim the title of "Highest Horse in the land"!

Beat the competition, and become the Highest Horse!

----------------------------------------

Features:

  • Competitive, high-octane horse-stacking gameplay!
  • 3 unique matches, with stronger and stronger CPU opponents!
  • A horse store with a 6 powerful upgrades!
  • A horse that calls you a winner!
  • 7 unique horse models you can stack!
  • and a secret unlockable horse! 

How to Play:

  • Left and Right Arrow Keys = Move
  • Spacebar = Jump
  • Shift = Sprint
  • A = Attack

----------------------------------------

Made in Gamemaker Studio 2

This game was made for Intro to Game Development and Design at UNCC:

The people who made it are Gemstone Incorporated:

Aliye Ozmez - Lead Artist

Sebastian "Bast" Grant - Lead Designer

Calvin Moore - Producer

Dillon Zhong - Lead Programmer
